segments.text: I don't know how to adjust my life . Would you give me a piece of advice ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You look a bit pale , don't you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I can't sleep well every night .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should get plenty of sleep .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I drink a lot of wine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If I were you , I wouldn't drink too much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You better do some exercise every morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I sometimes find the shadow of death in front of me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why do you worry about your future ? You're very young , and you'll make great contribution to the world . I hope you take my advice .
segments.speaker: S2
